description: This file contains test cases for the agent's event streaming functionality in the GraphNode backend API. It tests various scenarios including basic event streaming, asynchronous operation, intermediate steps, persistence, tool integration, reasoning, user confirmation, memory, structured output, and parser model responses.

classes.name: Person
classes.description: A Pydantic model used for structured output testing, representing a person with name, description, and age.

methods.name: test_basic_events
methods.description: Tests that the agent streams basic response events.

methods.name: test_async_basic_events
methods.description: Asynchronous test for streaming response events.

methods.name: test_basic_intermediate_steps_events
methods.description: Tests intermediate step events during a run.

methods.name: test_intermediate_steps_with_tools
methods.description: Tests event streaming with tool calls.

methods.name: test_intermediate_steps_with_reasoning
methods.description: Tests event streaming with reasoning steps.

methods.name: test_intermediate_steps_with_user_confirmation
methods.description: Tests user confirmation flow and event persistence.

methods.name: test_intermediate_steps_with_memory
methods.description: Tests event streaming with memory updates.

methods.name: test_intermediate_steps_with_structured_output
methods.description: Tests structured output with a Pydantic model.

methods.name: test_intermediate_steps_with_parser_model
methods.description: Tests parser model responses and events.
